dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Robert Clipp [mailto:clipper.clipp@gmail.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 14, 2007 9:10 PM
To: afce5960bd184a17a87fe48a31a52d0d.protect@whoisguard.com
Cc: Legal; Copyright; support@namecheap.com;
legal@primitivehomedecors.com; clipper.clipp@gmail.com
Subject: Re: Copyright Infringement

 

Thank you for your resonse to my March 7, 2007 email.  The attached
documents should "substantially comply with the required notification
elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA") ".  I
will fax copies of the attached documents to Google and The Planet.  I
can't find a fax number for namecheap.com so I will have to mail them
copies.  If you care to disclose your fax number or mailing address,
I'll send you copies too. 

 

 

Robert Clipp

Owner

Accent PHD

http://www.primitivehomedecors.com/

317-292-2229

 



 

On 3/7/07, Robert Clipp <clipper.clipp@gmail.com> wrote: 

The web site http://www.happyoutside.com/ registered by ENOM, INC. is
re-publishing my original content <http://www.primitivehomedecors.com/>
as their own.  I own and operate http://www.primitivehomedecors.com/ and
I have spent hundreds of hours developing the content and structure of
my store.  Please remove all of my intellectual property from your
servers on or before March 9, 2007.  I will begin the formal DMCA
complaint process on March 10th if required. 

 

A treceroute to http://www.happyoutside.com/ resolves to 
http://5b.b4.5446.static.theplanet.com/
<http://5b.b4.5446.static.theplanet.com/> 

Domain tools <http://whois.domaintools.com/happyoutside.com>  actually
shows the SSL cert for http://www.happyoutside.com/ as issued to my
store.

 

Thank you for your prompt response,

 

Robert Clipp

Owner

Accent PHD

http://www.primitivehomedecors.com/

317-292-2229

 

 

March 14, 2007
Sender Information:
Accent PHD d.b.a. Primitive Home Decors Sent by: Robert Clipp, Owner
8136 Hayworth Road
Indianapolis, IN, 46221, USA
Recipient Information:
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries
Andrea Z. Almeida
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Sent via fax (214) 782-7756, Attn: Andrea Z. Almeida and via e-mail to copyright@theplanet.com
Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement 
March 14, 2007 
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 
Ladies and Gentlemen: 
I act on behalf of Accent PHD (the "Owner"). 
As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
